review: i would definitely recommended Dr. Namita to all my friends who have dental issues... Dr. is too friendly and caring... I had wisdom tooth extraction and she keeps following up with me to know if the pain has subsided or not... I mean who does that... I never met a doctor like her in my life... I always had dental issues since childhood and whenever I had pain I use to ignore it cz the doctors I use to visit were not really friendly in terms of explaining the issue. But doctor Namita is one of the gem who is worried about the patient's concern and fix it and explain it throughly... #bestdentistevermet
reply_text: Thank you for such an amazing feedback. We are glad that you had a wonderful experience at City Smiles Dental Clinic. Your kind words keep us motivated to do the best for our patients. Keep Smiling üòä
